articles.author: Mark Chediak, Jennifer A Dlouhy
articles.title: US Imposes New Duties on Solar Imports From Southeast Asia - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The US set new duties as high as 3,521% on solar imports from four Southeast Asian countries, delivering a win for domestic manufacturers while intensifying headwinds already threatening the country’s renewable power development.
